title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 46.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 46.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part applies to every individual life insurance policy issued or delivered in this State, group life insurance policy issued or delivered in this State, and group life insurance certificate deemed to have been delivered in this State pursuant to section
3201 (b)(1)
of the Insurance Law, that provides unemployment lapse protection benefits. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
46.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
